author: Dominique Astorino
title: Doughnut Sneakers Fitness
text:
Look, as cool as it is to work out to feel good or because it's the right thing to do or because you want to live longer . . . sometimes you just gotta look yourself in the mirror and say " I'm in this for the doughnuts ."
@bstreetshoes with my #donuttrainer customs! @nobullproject
A post shared by Club For All Things NOBULL (@nobullprojectfanclub) on Mar 27, 2017 at 5:44pm PDT
That's what B Street Shoes was thinking when it customized these bright pink bad boys from No Bull shoes — Pink Grey Trainers ($129).
These training sneaks were cute to begin with, but B Street took them to the next level with a custom sprinkle paint job. This kind of doughnut love comes at a price, though — more than double the cost of the plain shoes. Custom Sprinkle Doughnut Shoes from B Street will run you $289.
Related:
10 Times Doughnuts Derailed Our Clean Eating (and We Weren't That Mad About It)
